title: SoftBank will cut investments to a fourth in 2022 as tech shares plunge globally - Moneycontrol
content:
1. SoftBank will cut investments to a fourth in 2022 as tech shares plunge globally  Moneycontrol
  2. Softbank Reports $13 Billion Annual Loss, Hit By Tech-share Slump  Mint
  3. SoftBank group posts $13 billion in losses amid tech sell-off  Economic Times
  4. SoftBank reports $13 billion FY net loss, faces sliding tech portfolio  Business Standard
  5. SoftBank Group reports historic $13B loss, hit by falling tech valuations  YourStory
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Compared to last year, the amount of new investment will be half or could be as small as a quarter, said the conglomerate's billionaire CEO Masayoshi Son
